metadata.title: CVE-2021-39888 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab EE starting from 13.10 before 14.1.7, allversions starting from 14.2 before 14.2.5, and all versions starting from14.3 before 14.3.1 a specific API endpoint may reveal details about aprivate group and other sensitive info inside issue and merge requesttemplates.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
